title: 820-01700 U9200 shorted
message:
Clean board, U9580 looked burned in one corner, after removing U9580 short was still there, so after injecting 2.5V U9200 barely gets hot, but that is the only place that gets hot, this is not a full short, only 0.010 in diode mode.

Is there a way to replace this NAND chips from other boards? 

I don't have a problem with the reball etc, but I don't have the same exact board in this case.

title: 820-01700 U9200 shorted
message:
You may need to replace all NAND chips, from exactly same donor board model.
SSD ROM and controller may also need to change them.
And must pass through DFU, if possible.

title: 820-01700 U9200 shorted
message:
can I know from 2informaticos you which are in component number of the ssd ROM and Controller?
does it work if the machine has less or more capacity?
